channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:38 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:38 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 09:27 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter!
item.description: 游댮 09:27 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:09 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further messages.

item.title: 游릭 08:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 08:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated.
